content.question: An object is moving in the <math alttext="x y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi></math>-plane. At <math alttext="t equals 1 second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mtext> s</mtext></math>, the object’s velocity is <math alttext="3 meters per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>3</mn><mtext> m</mtext><mo>/</mo><mtext>s</mtext></math> in the <math alttext="positive x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mo>+</mo><mi>x</mi></math>-direction. At <math alttext="t equals 2 seconds" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mtext> s</mtext></math>, the object’s velocity is <math alttext="4 meters per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>4</mn><mtext> m</mtext><mo>/</mo><mtext>s</mtext></math> in the <math alttext="positive y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mo>+</mo><mi>y</mi></math>-direction. What is the average acceleration of the object between <math alttext="t equals 1 second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mtext> s</mtext></math> and <math alttext="t equals 2 seconds" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mtext> s</mtext></math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="5 meters per second squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>5</mn><mtext> m</mtext><mo>/</mo><msup><mtext>s</mtext><mn>2</mn></msup></math> at <math alttext="53 degrees" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msup><mn>53</mn><mo>∘</mo></msup></mstyle></math> above the <math alttext="positive x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mo>+</mo><mi>x</mi></math>-direction

<math alttext="5 meters per second squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>5</mn><mtext> m</mtext><mo>/</mo><msup><mtext>s</mtext><mn>2</mn></msup></math> at <math alttext="53 degrees" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msup><mn>53</mn><mo>∘</mo></msup></mstyle></math> above the <math alttext="negative x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi></math>-direction

<math alttext="1 meter per second squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn><mtext> m</mtext><mo>/</mo><msup><mtext>s</mtext><mn>2</mn></msup></math> in the <math alttext="positive x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mo>+</mo><mi>x</mi></math>-direction

<math alttext="1 meter per second squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn><mtext> m</mtext><mo>/</mo><msup><mtext>s</mtext><mn>2</mn></msup></math> in the <math alttext="negative x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi></math>-direction

content.answer: <math alttext="5 meters per second squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>5</mn><mtext> m</mtext><mo>/</mo><msup><mtext>s</mtext><mn>2</mn></msup></math> at <math alttext="53 degrees" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msup><mn>53</mn><mo>∘</mo></msup></mstyle></math> above the <math alttext="negative x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi></math>-direction

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
